DOC.brief_summary: This randomize control study evaluate impact 2 month oral appliance therapy endothelial function patient severe obstructive sleep apnea syndrome intolerant continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) therapy .
DOC.brief_title: VASO-AM : Impact Oral Appliance Therapy Endothelial Function Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: AHI > 30 Intolerance CPAP therapy Signed informed consent Epworth sleepiness scale > 16/24 Severe cardiac and/or respiratory disease BMI > 32 kg/m2 Dental contraindication oral appliance
